info.name: ROBLOX New Logo Replacement 2.0
info.description:
A style that replaces the new ROBLOX logo with the old one. ROBLOX New Logo Replacement 1.0  https://userstyles.org/styles/137531/roblox-new-logo-replacement
ROBUX New Logo Replacement https://userstyles.org/styles/204058/robux-new-logo-replacement-for-dark-theme
info.additionalInfo:
May 25 2021: Replaced the Roblox Logo at signup page.
May 23 2021: Replaced the Roblox Logo at Event page.
May 22 2021: Replaced the Roblox Logo at Events pages.
May 20 2021: Replaced the new Roblox O with old Roblox R at joining games.
